The descriptions and the explanations of different groups and people who were imprisoned are very well done in Korean. It was a big shame that those who cannot read Korean could not have the same great experience of learning about the history of Korea at that time, which is also often misrepresented in other sources.  I also found that the music added to the video presentations of interviews with the survivors of the prison was unnecessary and lessened the their effect.
